data.title: How To Listen To FOX Sports Radio New Jersey
data.meta_description: FOX Sports New Jersey is always available on your radio but there are also several other ways you can listen.
data.text:
FOX Sports New Jersey is always available on your radio but there are also several other ways you can listen.

Stream Us:

Simply click on the play button on the top right corner of the foxsportsradionewjersey.com website and start listening.

Amazon Alexa:

If you have an Amazon Echo then you’ve got a new way to listen to FOX Sports New Jersey at home and work! You may need to reenable your Alexa skill, instructions to do so are below.

Now, anytime you want to hear 93.5 FM / 1450 AM, all you have to do is tell Alexa – it’s as easy as saying “Alexa, open FOX Sports Radio New Jersey.”

You and Your Alexa:

1.) The first time (and only the first time) you use the skill you must ENABLE it by either:

Visiting Amazon.com

OR clearly tell your Amazon Echo: ALEXA, ENABLE Fox Sports Radio New Jersey.

2.) Tell Alexa to open FOX Sports Radio New Jersey.

3.) Listen to 93.5 FM / 1450 AM or to one of our PODCASTS!

FOX Sports Radio New Jersey App:
